code: import{applyMiddleware,compose,createStore}from'redux';import reducer from'./reducers';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootSaga from'./sagas';export function configureStore(){var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);return store;}
